content.rendered:
Oversize and overweight baggage

Fees and seasonal limitations vary by destination. Contact Reservations for help and to make sure your oversize baggage will fit on the plane. Also, more than one fee may apply to a bag. For example, the checked bag fee + 9olcoo0kmn e + overweight fee.

Oversize baggage

We don’t accept checked bags over 126 in / 320 cm.

All baggage fees are non-refundable and apply per person, each way.

Fees to / from Asia

When traveling to or from Asia you will be charged $200 for bags larger than 62 in / 158cm.

Fees to / from U.S. Domestic

Region Larger than 62 in / 158 cm
Between U.S., Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands and Canada $200
Mexico / Caribbean / Central and South America* $200
Brazil* $150
Europe (transatlantic) $150
China, Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong and Australia (transpacific) $200

Overweight baggage

We don’t accept checked bags over 100 lbs / 45 kgs.

All baggage fees are non-refundable and apply per person, each way.

First and Business Class, Executive Platinum and oneworld Emerald members can check baggage up to 70 lbs / 32 kgs at no extra cost.

Fees to / from Asia

When traveling to or from Asia you will be charged $100 for bags weighing 51 lbs. / 23 kgs – 70 lbs. / 32 kgs and $450 for bags weighing 71lbs. / 32kgs – 100lbs. /45kgs.

Fees to / from U.S. Domestic

Region 51 lbs / 23 kgs – 70 lbs / 32 kgs 71 lbs / 32 kgs – 100 lbs / 45 kgs
Between U.S., Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands and Canada $100 $200
Mexico / Caribbean / Central and South America $100 $200
Brazil* $0 $200
Europe (transatlantic) $100 Not accepted
China, Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong and Australia (transpacific) $100 $450 (Not accepted to/from Australia)

*Year-round checked baggage limitations apply to Bolivia and some cities in Brazil. For Brasilia, Recife and Salvador, we don’t accept checked bags over 70 lbs / 32 kgs or checked bags/boxes over 62 in / 158 cm.

 

For more details visit : http://www.american eagle.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

American Eagle Airlines Hand|Cabin Baggage

American Eagle Airlines Checked Baggage
